Detailed Description

UART transfer structure.

#include <am_hal_uart.h>

◆ pfnCallback

am_hal_uart_callback_t am_hal_uart_transfer_t::pfnCallback

For non-blocking transfers, the UART HAL will call this callback function as soon as the requested action is complete.

◆ pui32BytesTransferred

uint32_t* am_hal_uart_transfer_t::pui32BytesTransferred

When the transaction is complete, this will be set to the number of bytes we read.

void* am_hal_uart_transfer_t::pvContext

This context variable will be saved and provided to the callback function when it is called.

◆ ui32TimeoutMs

uint32_t am_hal_uart_transfer_t::ui32TimeoutMs

For blocking transactions, this determines how long the UART HAL should wait before aborting the transaction.

◆ ui8Priority

uint8_t am_hal_uart_transfer_t::ui8Priority

DMA: Priority 0 = Low (best effort); 1 = High (service immediately)
